catalog_info.title: Foundations of Systems Biology and Biological Engineering
catalog_info.notes: Students from physics, engineering and other disciplines are also welcome.
catalog_info.prereq: Prerequisite: (LPS A OR LS 1a) AND (LS 1b) AND (MCB 60 OR (MCB 52 AND MCB 54))
catalog_info.description: This course builds an understanding of design principles in biology. We will ask why biological circuits are built the way they are and answer using mathematical models. Topics: elementary circuits in biological networks, robustness, pattern-formation in embryos, error-correction, and evolutionary optimization.
